sentences.en: A career in law is becoming increasingly attractive to young people.
sentences.cn: 法律行业对年轻人的吸引力越来越大。

sentences.en: a political movement that is attractive to young people
sentences.cn: 吸引年轻人的政治运动

sentences.en: Co-operation was more than just an attractive option, it was an obligation.
sentences.cn: 合作不仅仅是诱人的选择，它也是一种责任。

sentences.en: He surrounds himself with attractive, intelligent, or well-known people.
sentences.cn: 他混迹于有魅力、有学问或有名气的人当中。

sentences.en: He was immensely attractive to women, onscreen and offscreen.
sentences.cn: 银屏内外的他都令女性为之倾倒。

sentences.en: I thought he was very attractive and obviously very intelligent.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他魅力非凡，才智过人。

sentences.en: Kitchen utensils should be attractive as well as functional.
sentences.cn: 厨房用具应该既美观又实用。

sentences.en: Making easy money has always been an attractive proposition.
sentences.cn: 轻松赚钱总是件诱人的事。

sentences.en: Oddly, Emma says she never considered her face was attractive.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的是，埃玛说她从来都不认为自己长得好看。

sentences.en: Port-Louis is an attractive little fishing port.
sentences.cn: 路易港是个漂亮的小渔港。

sentences.en: She had a gamine charm which men found irresistibly attractive.
sentences.cn: 她有一种男人们抗拒不了的顽皮可爱的魅力。

sentences.en: She was tall, blonde, and attractive.
sentences.cn: 她个子高挑，一头金发，非常迷人。

sentences.en: Sofia was attractive and formidably intelligent.
sentences.cn: 索菲娅很有魅力，而且才智过人。

sentences.en: The deal seems so attractive it would be ridiculous to say no.
sentences.cn: 这笔交易看上去太诱人了，要是拒绝它简直是笑话。

sentences.en: The two hotel-restaurants are attractive bases from which to explore southeast Tuscany.
sentences.cn: 对于去托斯卡纳东南部探险的人们来说，这两家酒店是很有吸引力的驻扎地。

sentences.en: They have to be thin, attractive and well-dressed to boot.
sentences.cn: 她们必须得既苗条又迷人，而且一定要打扮漂亮。

sentences.en: Women of his own middle class found him overwhelmingly attractive.
sentences.cn: 同属中产阶级的女性觉得他的魅力令人难以抗拒。

sentences.en: Women seem to find him attractive .
sentences.cn: 女性似乎觉得他很有吸引力。

words.tran_cn: 迷人地；有吸引力地；动人地
吸引，吸引力；引力；吸引人的事物
[自] 吸引子；引起注意的人

trans.tran_cn: 有魅力的，好看的，吸引人的，悦耳的
trans.tran_en: someone who is attractive is good looking, especially in a way that makes you sexually interested in them
